title: Michigan State University
description: Michigan State University utilizes a distinctive color scheme that symbolizes its identity and spirit, predominantly featuring dark green (18453B) alongside complementary black (000000) and white (FFFFFF) for contrast. Additional shades, such as forest green (008208), lime green (7BBD00), and teal (0B9A6D), further embellish its visual identity. These colors are officially documented by the university's licensing office and can be accessed for design reference on their Art Sheet found at https://licensing.msu.edu/licensees/art-sheet-msu.pdf.
